purpose.description: Great job! You have completed almost all the project tasks: replaced named colors with hex, used RGBA for overlays, and filled in HSL values for color swatches.
For Task 4, the footer overlay should use the same RGBA value as the h1 text (rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)), which you have done correctly.

Double-check the HSL values for the green and blue base colors and their swatches. The green and blue lightness and hue patterns may need minor adjustments to match the exact increments described in the instructions.

readability.description: Your CSS is well-organized, with clear section comments and consistent indentation.
Consider adding brief comments above each major section (e.g., /* Footer Overlay */) to make it even easier to navigate.
For color swatch patterns, you could add a short comment explaining the increment/decrement logic for future reference.

performance.description: You have used CSS color functions (hex, rgba, hsl) efficiently and consistently throughout the stylesheet.
To further improve maintainability, consider using CSS custom properties (variables) for repeated color values like the brand orange or overlay colors.
If you want to make the overlays more flexible, you could define the RGBA values as variables as well.
